title: Self-Regulated Learning and Motivation Enhancement Program for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Nursing Theories and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: A program for working nursing students, optimized for smartphone-based learning environments while balancing employment responsibilities

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute weekly learning plans by applying self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, time management, self-assessment)
Learners can explain at least three specific strategies for enhancing intrinsic motivation (e.g., recognizing learning value, self-efficacy enhancement techniques)
Learners can systematically analyze learning processes and derive improvement strategies by writing reflective journals using metacognition

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
